snippet: Regulators say that top clients received preferential treatment through Goldman Sach’s “trading huddles,” when the bank’s research analysts meet to develop trading tips.
abstract: Regulators say that top clients received preferential treatment through Goldman Sach’s “trading huddles,” when the bank’s research analysts meet to develop trading tips.

headline.main: Goldman Fined $22 Million Over Trading Huddles
headline.print_headline: Goldman Sachs to Pay $22 Million to Regulators
